name: Mike Glover
text: I couldn‚Äôt take a picture of the frigid temperature of the breadstick sauce. We haven‚Äôt had Pizza Hut in some time but I can assure that based on this experience, it will be the last. So disappointed in our meal tonight. Want to love it but just can‚Äôt any longer.  Throwing out nearly $50 in food tonight. Shame on this Pizza Hut location.

name: Cindy Gosman
text: We just got a large 3 topping pizza, not very good, waited 45 minutes....they were busy so understand ... however our crust tasted like it was from yesterday, and even though I was handed the pizza just after it was cut. It was not very warm.  I like pizza hut , but tonight was not there best night.

name: SLW Wilson Sr.
text: Really good pizza. Great service.

name: Patty Hayes
text: Pizza was supposed to be delivered at 7:50. 7:55 I called and was told there were no delivery drivers and ours would go out when a driver got back.  Called again at 8:20. No apologies,  no offer for a discount . Nothing. Pizza finally delivered at 7:25.

name: J
text: Good food fast service

name: Michael Barchick
text: The pizza was  good and the employee at the counter was very friendly

name: M G H
text: We always order from this store. And never had a bad experience. They make our favorite traditional wings (prefer it over B-dubs) and stuffed crust pepperoni pizza. Customer Service and Delivery Service are thumbs up!

name: Kylie Fernandoz
text: Your local pizza restaurant. Pizza tastes average. Nice service and was fast though

name: Brenten Brooks
text: This is supposed to be a stuff crust pizza. Apparantly no cheese is being used. It's all liquid, but cold. It's the consistancy of grits. There is absolutely no cheese in my stuffed crust. This is the sorriest excuse of a pizza I have ever ‚Ä¶More

name: Nash Menden
text: I ordered the cinnamon stick dessert and they gave me breadsticks with a mound of cinnamon sugar on top, and instead of giving me icing, they gave me blue ranch dressing. I'm buying from papa John's for now on

name: vwbeetle72jellybeen
text: Always a great meal when you're in a pinch. Still the great original recipes, and some new ones to boot. This was my first time trying buffalo wings, and I've got to tell you, they're amazing!

name: Chris Allen
text: Definitely one of the best pizza huts. Consistently good quality.

name: Chris Huerta
text: The food was very good as usual; with the pizza I do not think we have ever been disappointed. It allways taste good and that is no matter if it's thin crust or hand tossed. One topping or the works and anything in between... Tried the chicken wings for the first time, very good and the mini cinnabon are always delicious.

name: Ben Timberlake
text: Super fast and a great pizza

name: Just Gigi
text:
Sad to say because I love Pizza Hut. I ordered a large pizza and it was burnt. The delivery driver had a attitude.
And I currently have a stomach ache....

name: Brian Gamble
text: If medium one topping pizzas are 5 dollars and I order 3 and add 1 topping to two of them how does that cost 26 dollars employees don't do math I guess because they couldn't help me to understand it 3x5=15+2 toppings  at 1.50=3. So ‚Ä¶More

name: Joseph Hamric

name: Adam Wright
text: This is the worse Pizza Hut known to man. They cannot get an order correct. They have burned me about 10 times.  They can‚Äôt cook breadsticks without burning them. Do not eat here!!

name: inez hockaday
text: My order was incorrect but they remade it with no problem. Great customer service!

name: George Tucker
text: Received call from driver. He had wrong address. Said he wasn‚Äôt coming and was headed back to store since  we weren‚Äôt in his store‚Äôs delivery zone.  Verify address or risk wasting your time!

name: LaRon Johnson Sr.
text: Ordered, a medium pizza, 8 boneless wings, with cheese sticks. Received the food slightly warm, pizza was apart when I opened the box.  Called back to let them know and was told they can remake order but delivery time would be another hour. ‚Ä¶More

text: Closest pizza hut from Moyock, NC. Great pizza! Look out for the deals online to save some cash.

name: Patricia Brantes
text: Always great customer service !! This definitely is my go-to location when it comes to Pizza Hut.

name: Lakisha Parker-Garrett
text: Messed up my order.  Ordered a Supreme.  They forgot the veggies.  Gave me a small container of raw green peppers. Very disappointed.

name: Taylor Sawyer
text: They‚Äôre pretty great I‚Äôve always gotten my pizza from them, and I think they‚Äôve perfected pizza. I usually get carry out, so I don‚Äôt know a lot about the delivery, but I do know it‚Äôs better than digiorno.

name: Brad Johnson
text: $40+  One pizza was great.   The other pizza and cheese sticks we're complete garbage .  Completely undercooked.   What a waste

name: Ginger Rice
text: Just had pizza and wings delivered. Crazy price ($25) for burnt 2 med, half topped pizza and boneless wings that were chewy. Will not be ordering from this location again. Not to mention the customer service, which left much to be desired.

name: Victoria Deleon
text: Terrible customer experience!!! The driver, MARK, once he delivered my pizza and AFTER I gave him a tip said just the tip for you I won't be delivering out here again if not worth it for the alignment of my car and once I called the manager ‚Ä¶More

name: No Life Noah

text: They can't seem to get my order right.

name: William Gray
text: Worst pizza hut i have ever been in.  It smells nasty everything is sticky looks unclean and sloppy.  There is only one person in the store doing everything.  Pizza took about a half hour longer then they said but it is hot and good.  In my opinion the employees care more about the place then the owner.

name: Leslie & Kemo Dassau
text: One of the better customer service PH

text: Customer service was fast. You order, you pay, you receive. Still wonder how people spend enough time in there to get bad customer service. Clean and pizza looked just like the picture.
